duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop, write, and test code within Groovy and Java to implement PriceFx changes
Help the client migrate their legacy ERP system and understand how PriceFx interfaces from the legacy system
Integrate the new ERP system, Oracle Cloud Fusion, using PriceFx and Groovy knowledge
Require little to no supervision and be able to hit the ground running

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field (Master's preferred)
